comments.body: Thanks for this PR, very nice improvements! Could you please add few lines here, just with a high level overview how packing is done, and where this template is used, just to help the next reader of this code.

> Thanks for this PR, very nice improvements! Could you please add few lines here, just with a high level overview how packing is done, and where this template is used, just to help the next reader of this code.
